original_text: Josiah did things that the Lord said were right. He lived in the good ways of his ancestor, King David. He did not turn away from the Lord's teaching in any way. Chronicles 33 Chronicles 35
korean_text: 여호와 보시기에 정직하게 행하여 그의 조상 다윗의 길로 걸으며 좌우로 치우치지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: Josiah did things that the Lord said were right.
sentences.korean_translation: 요시아는 여호와께서 옳다고 하신 일들을 행했습니다.

sentences.original_text: He lived in the good ways
He did not turn away from the Lord's teaching
